A further 17 people have died after testing positive for coronavirus in Wales, bringing the total number to 925.
Public Health Wales today recorded 160 new known cases, meaning 9,972 people have tested positive for the disease in Wales, although the actual n… [+5089 chars]

articles.author: John Holden
articles.title: Worthing beekeeper loses 'his whole livelihood' after 630,000 bees killed by vandals - Worthing Herald
articles.description: A Worthing beekeeper has lost 'his whole livelihood' and seen more than 600,000 bees killed in an act of senseless vandalism.
articles.content:
Doug Pearce has owned South Downs Honey for more than three years, with millions of bees in hives across the South Downs.
Like many other businesses Doug's trade was already decimated by the coronavirus pandemic, reducing his takings by at least half accordi… [+2346 chars]

articles.title: Tributes paid to "popular" Southampton hospital porter who's died after testing positive for Covid-19 - ITV News
articles.description:
Tributes are being paid to a hospital porter in Southampton, who has died after testing positive for coronavirus.

Mike Brown, 61, was admitted to Southampton General Hospital and was receiving treatment in its critical care unit, before passing away in the e…
